description:
This is a spacious (800 sqft / 74 sqm) 1 bdrm apt on Riverside Dr near 116th St – just behind Columbia University campus and subway station and right on the Hudson River, fully renovated, furnished and equipped, including home theater projector - just plug your phone/laptop and enjoy it! The apartment is very quiet, has elevator, doorman and laundry service in the building.

subway #1 is, which stops at all major stations in midtown and downtown is just around the corner.
name: spacious 1 bdrm apt on the Hudson River
review:
The best stay ever in New York!
you would love the place.
